alert.note: Alert for Barry; Douglas; Ozark; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 7:48AM CST until January 12 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Wet snow and sleet. Light sleet accumulations ahead of the snow. Additional snow accumulations of one to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri. * WHEN...Until Noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Numerous slide-offs and accidents have been reported in areas where snow has started sticking to roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
